obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_80_0: \EH* The hell did you do to us!?/%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_147_0: * Hon hon!^1! Cool your burners^1, folks!!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_217_0: \EL* Oh^1, okay. That actually makes sense./%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_230_0: * Kris^1, your mother used to \O1 cooking shows^1, didn't she?/%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_243_0: * Oh^1, how she'd LAUGH^1, glowingly^1, along with each new recipe^1,/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_244_0: * Feverishly taking notes on each step to make them for her family.../%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_261_0: * As you and your \O2 pretended the chefs were bungling the simplest parts!/%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_273_0: * "Oops!^1! No!^1! I keep breaking the eggs!^1! Oops!!"/%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_293_0: * AHAHAHA!^1! Hahaha!^1! That sure was \O3^1, wasn't it?/%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_322_0: * Now^1, are you ready or what!?/%
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_374_0: * Here are the instructions for the \O0^1./
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_375_0: * FOOD is FALLING^1! KRIS^1, CATCH the food on your head to STACK IT UP^1!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_376_0: * THROW it to customers with ~1^1! If the food touches them^1, they'll gobble it up^1!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_377_0: * SPECIAL CUSTOMERS will sometimes appear^1! They're worth \O1 POINTs^1, don't miss 'em^1!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_378_0: * SUSIE will probably cook BURNING FIRE. JUMP over it with ~1^1!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_379_0: * Missed food will also turn into BURNING FIRE, so be careful!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_380_0: * Big stack^1, \O1 POINTs^1! But..^1. You'll MOVE and JUMP slower^1! Be careful!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_381_0: * Last until the end to \O2^1 But if the POPULARITY GAUGE runs out^1, it's GAME OVER^1!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_382_0: * Now don't touch that dial^1, OR that fire^1!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_484_0: * THAT's what I like to hear!/
obj_ch3_GSA04_slash_Step_0_gml_485_0: * Now get those pans over easy^1, or these eggs are gonna be TOUGH!/%
